nodes.text: The Corellian Destroyer was a blaster rifle favored by commandos during the time of the Galactic Civil War for its huge damage output.

Ging Darjeek stood alongside a Corellian Destroyer in the lounge of the Bela Vistal cantina, where it was later collected by a spacer. The Corellian Destroyer was also held by some Kerritamba warriors in the Kkowir Forest region of Kashyyyk.
